name: Sonic Shock
description:
There's something not quite right on Space Colony M0B1...

After a cryogenic chamber malfunction, you awaken on Space Colony M0B1 after a devastating attack has already taken place. Everyone has either been killed or roboticized by Doctor Roboton and his henchmen. As the last non-robot non-corpse left, only you can sneak through the colony, find Roboton, and put a stop to his evil before he can turn another civilization to rust.

Fight, sneak, hack, swim, and collect mayhem rubies in this half-System Shock half-Sonic the Hedgehog all-stock photo adventure.

Features

  • Five Areas to explore and sneak or fight your way through
  • Accessibility Options and Reconfigurable Controls
  • Stock Photography and Public Domain Music for all in-game media
  • Four special cyperspace stages
  • Several upgradable abilities including four active Mayhem Abilities.
